Cascadia R Conference

June 2, 2018
Portland, OR





Submit a Talk!



CFP: bit.ly/cascadiarconf18-cfp

Diversity Scholarship: bit.ly/cascadiarconf18-diversity

Childcare : bit.ly/cascadiarconf18-childcare


Deadline: April 30, 2018



Location

OHSU Collaborative Life Science Building

2730 SW Moody Ave, Portland, OR 97201


Directions: Please enter CLSB through the South entrance and go to the 3rd floor via the South Elevators. 3A001/3A002 (the main conference location) is across the short bridge.
